NewsArticle.Title: Nexon hosts Dark Ages Art Contest
NewsArticle.Content: Send us your original Dark Ages: Online Roleplaying art for a chance to win permanent fame and recognition that even change your status and power in the game. Your creativity touches us; Nexon continues to encourage you to use your imagination. That is the true meaning of being an Aisling. Schedule Entry Deadline: 2002/01/09, 11:59 p.m. PST Winners Announced: 2002/01/16 How to Enter and othe details
